abstract: With the sale, BP will have raised about $21 billion of the $30 billion it hoped to reap from asset sales by next summer to help cover damages from its oil spill disaster.
snippet: With the sale, BP will have raised about $21 billion of the $30 billion it hoped to reap from asset sales by next summer to help cover damages from its oil spill disaster.

headline.main: BP to Sell Majority Stake in Pan American Energy

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
